'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{lax3}}.

==Background==
Deep inside the titan body of Wael, and final area of The Forgotten Sanctum. Here the Watcher will face off against the [[Oracle of Wael]] and [[Fyonlecg]].

== Quests ==
* [[The Inner Mysteries]]

==Points of interest==

* Fyonlecg's body.
* Artery polyps: Can be killed (or popped, rather) in order to take down the Oracle.
* Arcane Channels.

==Characters==

* [[Oracle of Wael]]
* [[Fyonlecg]]

== Loot ==

* [[The Mask of the Weyc]]: Found on Fyonlecg's body. Needed for the achievement ''One of Them''.
* [[Ring of Clenched Muscle]]: Looted from the dead body of the Oracle of Wael.
